txt.en: 'I somehow offended the harbour-master at Kheledûl, so I came down here looking for work.'
'There is always work to be done, either here or up north at Kheledûl. It makes no difference to me.'
'My wife is back at Thorin's Hall right now, braiding her beard. I will visit her in a few days.'
'It is important to lift with your legs and not with your back. That's the first thing you learn.'
